long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Land Your Dream Software Engineering Job. Track Applications. Hone your Technical Skills. Upscale your Coding Ability. 

Save and track job applications and receive personalized interview prep powered by AI in one click!

Use Codei to effortlessly save job listings and track your applications.

Say goodbye to your tedious application spreadsheets. Easily track your applications by just clicking the extension button on the page of the application you would like to save! Codei's ApplicationAI model fetches all the relevant data and displays it for you. Get insights and data about the role instantly.

Don't know how to start preparing? Codei's QuestionAI model generates technical interview questions tailored to you and the role you are applying to. Practice on questions that will really prepare you for the interview and grow your portfolio.

After you have completed one of Codei's questions, simply paste the link of your Github repo into Codei's Submissions page. Codei's EvalAI model will score your repository and provide feedback on how to improve your coding skills and style!

Key Features:

Quick Save: Save job listings with one click.
Smart Capture: Automatically capture and organize job details.
AI-Powered Prep: Get personalized interview preparation tailored to each job using advanced AI.
Seamless Integration: Works with most job boards and career sites, including LinkedIn, Indeed, and Glassdoor.
Organized Tracking: Keep all your job applications and preparation materials in one place.

Simplify your job search, stay organized, and be well-prepared for every interview.
